title: Haunted.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Haunted.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


Year: 2012
Genre: Adventure / 3D
Developer: DECK13 Interactive
Publisher: Lace Mamba Global
Publication Type: RiP
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: RELOADED





System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium IV - 3.0 GHz / AMD Athlon XP - 2.4 GHz
Memory: 1 GB
Video: 256 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 5.2 GB


Game information:

Spending time in search of his missing sister, a girl
named Maria discovers he can see ghosts and understand
their language. Gradually collecting the crumbs of the
facts, it is getting closer and closer approaches to
solving the terrible secrets of the past, which is
somehow connected with the laboratory of Dr. Lindsay Ashford.

Game Features:

Incredibly intriguing story on the ghosts.
In the center of attention - the girl detective
and a crazy professor.
Detailed graphics.
Unique game events.

Repack Features:

Haunted
Do not cut / Do not recoded
highest quality texture included
Includes crack text from ZoG Forum Team v2.0
